sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(public router: Router) { } @Output() cerrarSesion = new EventEmitter(); public nombre_usuario = sessionStorage.getItem('name'); public apellidos = sessionStorage.getItem('apellidos'); public logOut(log: boolean) { sessionStorage.removeItem('id'); sessionStorage.removeItem('name'); sessionStorage.removeItem('apellidos'); this.cerrarSesion.emit(log); this.router.navigate(['login']); } }
    {{nombre_usuario}} {{apellidos}}
    • Home
    • Perfil
    • Cerrar Sesión
